content: Please list the Coin directory two top-level folder structure

Your favorites are Monero (XMR) first, Bitcoin (BTC) second, and Stellar (XLM) third.

## TL;DR
1) Monero (XMR) — favorite  
2) Bitcoin (BTC) — second  
3) Stellar (XLM) — third

If you want to reorder or add more, tell me the ranking and I’ll update it.
